title: Introduction
content: Codependence is a JavaScript utility for checking dependencies to ensure they're up-to-date or match a specified version. Learn about Synopsis, Why Use Codependence, and Why Not Use Codependence.

title: CLI Usage
content: Command line interface documentation for Codependence. Learn how to use codependence from the terminal with various options and flags.

title: Node.js API
content: Using Codependence programmatically in Node.js applications. Import and use the codependence API in your JavaScript or TypeScript projects.

title: Options
content: Configuration options for Codependence. Learn about all available options including --update, --unused, --circular, and more.

title: Usage Examples
content: Example usage patterns and common scenarios for using Codependence in your projects.

title: Recipes
content: Common recipes and patterns for using Codependence effectively in various project setups including monorepos.

title: Main Use Case
content: Primary use cases for Codependence - managing critical dependencies that must be at specific versions.
